rules.description: Cmd+Opt+KP0 ↦ {desktop≔0, Cmd+Opt+9, Cmd+Opt+Right}: Moves/Window to Full-Screened Window
desktop≡0 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Left ↦ {desktop≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to Desktop 9 (bottom-right screen on 3×3 grid)
desktop≡0 ⋀ Shift?+Cmd+Opt+Right ↦ {desktop≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to Desktop 1 (top-left screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP7 ↦ {desktop≔1, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+1}: Moves/Window to Desktop 1 (top-left screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP8 ↦ {desktop≔2, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+2}: Moves/Window to Desktop 2 (top-center screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP9 ↦ {desktop≔3, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+3}: Moves/Window to Desktop 3 (top-right screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP4 ↦ {desktop≔4, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+4}: Moves/Window to Desktop 4 (middle-left screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP5 ↦ {desktop≔5, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+5}: Moves/Window to Desktop 5 (middle-center screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP6 ↦ {desktop≔6, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+6}: Moves/Window to Desktop 6 (middle-right screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP1 ↦ {desktop≔7, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+7}: Moves/Window to Desktop 7 (bottom-left screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP2 ↦ {desktop≔8, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+8}: Moves/Window to Desktop 8 (bottom-center screen on 3×3 grid)
Shift?+Cmd+Opt+KP3 ↦ {desktop≔9, Shift?+Cmd+Opt+9}: Moves/Window to Desktop 9 (bottom-right screen on 3×3 grid)
